title: Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices Votes to Recommend Pfizer's Prevnar 13® Vaccine in Adults Aged 65 Years and Older
author: Carly Helfand
description: Wednesday, August 13, 2014 - 5:42pm EDT Pfizer Inc. (NYSE:PFE) today announced that the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's (CDC) Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices (ACIP)... | Wednesday, August 13, 2014 - 5:42pm EDT Pfizer Inc.
